idea-plugin.name: xndlnk-monokai
idea-plugin.description: This is a dark high-contrast Monokai theme for IntelliJ 2019.1+.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
• 2.0 - major color changes + bugfixes
    • selection background: blue
    • documentation background: very dark
    • removed background from keywords (bugfix)
    • use default color for js local variables
    • text search result: green, yellow
    • warning attributes error stripe color: more similar to background color
    • static method: yellow
    • default interface: light brown
    • default class: light brown
    • default function call: green
  • 1.4 - changed annotation color to a different green to differentiate it from function color green
  • 1.3.1 - minor adjustments to publish to JetBrains repository
